tag.stat: (1-1-1) Ensure mounting of cramfs filesystems is disabled
(1-1-2) Ensure mounting of squashfs filesystems is disabled
(1-1-3) Ensure mounting of udf filesystems is disabled
(1-1-4) Ensure nodev option set on /tmp partition
(1-1-5) Ensure nosuid option set on /tmp partition
(1-1-6) Ensure noexec option set on /tmp partition
(1-1-7) Ensure nodev option set on /var/tmp partition
(1-1-8) Ensure nosuid option set on /var/tmp partition
(1-1-9) Ensure noexec option set on /var/tmp partition
1-1-10 Ensure nodev option set on /home partition
1-1-11 Ensure nodev option set on /dev/shm partition
1-1-12 Ensure nosuid option set on /dev/shm partition
1-1-13 Ensure noexec option set on /dev/shm partition
1-1-14 Disable Automounting
1-2-1 Ensure gpgcheck is globally activated
1-2-2 Ensure package manager repositories are configured
1-3-1 Ensure sudo is installed
1-4-1 Ensure AIDE is installed
1-4-2 Ensure filesystem integrity is regularly checked
1-5-1 Ensure permissions on bootloader config are configured
1-5-2 Ensure bootloader password is set
1-5-3 Ensure authentication required for single user mode
1-6-1 Ensure core dumps are restricted
1-6-2 Ensure address space layout randomization (ASLR) is enabled
1-7-1 Ensure SELinux is installed
1-7-2 Ensure SELinux policy is configured
1-7-3 Ensure the SELinux state is enforcing
1-7-4 Ensure SETroubleshoot is not installed
1-7-5 Ensure the MCS Translation Service (mcstrans) is not installed
1-8-1 Ensure message of the day is configured properly
1-8-2 Ensure local login warning banner is configured properly
1-8-3 Ensure permissions on /etc/motd are configured
1-8-4 Ensure permissions on /etc/issue are configured
1-8-5 Ensure permissions on /etc/issue.net are configured
1-8-6 Ensure system-wide crypto policy is FUTURE or FIPS
2-1-1 Ensure xinetd is not installed
2-2-10 Ensure FTP Server is not enabled
2-2-11 Ensure DNS Server is not enabled
2-2-12 Ensure NFS is not enabled
2-2-13 Ensure RPC is not enabled
2-2-14 Ensure LDAP server is not enabled
2-2-15 Ensure DHCP Server is not enabled
2-2-16 Ensure CUPS is not enabled (Scored)
2-2-17 Ensure NIS Server is not enabled (Scored)
2-2-18 Ensure mail transfer agent is configured for local-only mode
2-2-1 Ensure time synchronization is in use
2-2-2 Ensure chrony is configured
2-2-3 Ensure rsync service is not enabled
2-2-4 Ensure Avahi Server is not enabled
2-2-5 Ensure SNMP Server is not enabled
2-2-6 Ensure HTTP Proxy Server is not enabled
2-2-7 Ensure Samba is not enabled
2-2-8 Ensure IMAP and POP3 server is not enabled
2-2-9 Ensure HTTP server is not enabled
2-3-1 Ensure NIS Client is not installed
2-3-2 Ensure telnet client is not installed
2-3-3 Ensure LDAP client is not installed
3-1-1 Ensure IP forwarding is disabled
3-1-2 Ensure packet redirect sending is disabled
3-2-1 Ensure source routed packets are not accepted
3-2-2 Ensure ICMP redirects are not accepted
3-2-3 Ensure secure ICMP redirects are not accepted
3-2-4 Ensure suspicious packets are logged
3-2-5 Ensure broadcast ICMP requests are ignored
3-2-6 Ensure bogus ICMP responses are ignored
3-2-7 Ensure Reverse Path Filtering is enabled
3-2-8 Ensure TCP SYN Cookies is enabled
3-2-9 Ensure IPv6 router advertisements are not accepted
3-3-1 Ensure SCTP is disabled
3-4-1 Ensure a Firewall package is installed
3-4-2 Ensure firewalld service is enabled and running
3-4-3 Ensure nftables is not enabled
3-4-4 Ensure default zone is set
3-4-5 Ensure network interfaces are assigned to appropriate zone
3-4-6 Ensure iptables is not enabled
3-4-7 Ensure a table exists
3-4-8 Ensure nftables service is enabled
3-5 Ensure wireless interfaces are disabled
3-6 Disable IPv6
4-1-10 Ensure events that modify date and time information are collected
4-1-11 Ensure events that modify the system Mandatory Access Controls are collected
4-1-12 Ensure events that modify the system network environment are collected
4-1-13 Ensure discretionary access control permission modification are collected
4-1-14 Ensure events that modify user/group information are collected
4-1-15 Ensure successful file system mounts are collected
4-1-16 Ensure file deletion events by users are collected
4-1-17 Ensure kernel module loading and unloading is collected
4-1-1 Ensure auditd is installed
4-1-2 Ensure auditd service is enabled
4-1-3 Ensure auditing for processes that start prior to auditd is enabled
4-1-4 Ensure audit log storage size is configured
4-1-5 Ensure audit logs are not automatically deleted
4-1-6 Ensure system is disabled when audit logs are full
4-1-7 Ensure changes to system administration scope is collected
4-1-8 Ensure login and logout events are collected
4-1-9 Ensure session initiation information is collected
4-2-1 Ensure rsyslog is installed
4-2-2 Ensure rsyslog Service is enabled
